meanings.definition: More substantial or filling in quantity or quality.
meanings.sent1: The stew became heartier with the addition of more vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The heartier soup was perfect for the cold winter night.
meanings.sent3: The heartier sandwich was so big, it could barely fit in my mouth!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a heartier version of a gentle breeze, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The heartier meal left everyone feeling satisfied and content.

meanings.definition: More enthusiastic or vigorous in manner or behavior.
meanings.sent1: His heartier greeting made me feel welcome right away.
meanings.sent2: The heartier applause showed their appreciation for the performance.
meanings.sent3: She gave a heartier wave when she spotted her friend across the street.
meanings.sent4: The heartier cheers from the crowd motivated the team to push harder.
meanings.sent5: Their heartier support lifted his spirits and encouraged him to keep going.
